sentences: Kathryn Chandria Manuel Bernardo (born March 26, 1996) is a Filipina actress who is known for her roles in the television series Mara Clara (2010–2011).
Kathryn Chandria Manuel Bernardo (born March 26, 1996) is a Filipina actress who is known for her roles in the television series Mara Clara (2010–2011).
, Pangako Sa 'Yo (2015–2016), and La Luna Sangre (2017–2018).
, Pangako Sa 'Yo (2015–2016), and La Luna Sangre (2017–2018).

She is also known for roles in the films She's Dating the Gangster (2014), Crazy Beautiful You (2015), Barcelona: A Love Untold (2016), The Hows of Us (2018), and Hello, Love, Goodbye (2019), the latter two of which are the highest grossing Filipino films of all time.

She is also known for roles in the films She's Dating the Gangster (2014), Crazy Beautiful You (2015), Barcelona: A Love Untold (2016), The Hows of Us (2018), and Hello, Love, Goodbye (2019), the latter two of which are the highest grossing Filipino films of all time.

She is also known for roles in the films She's Dating the Gangster (2014), Crazy Beautiful You (2015), Barcelona: A Love Untold (2016), The Hows of Us (2018), and Hello, Love, Goodbye (2019), the latter two of which are the highest grossing Filipino films of all time.

She is also known for roles in the films She's Dating the Gangster (2014), Crazy Beautiful You (2015), Barcelona: A Love Untold (2016), The Hows of Us (2018), and Hello, Love, Goodbye (2019), the latter two of which are the highest grossing Filipino films of all time.
She currently is the only Filipino actress with two films earning more than P800 million each.
EdukCircle listed her as one of the Most Influential Celebrities of the Decade.
Bernardo was born on March 26, 1996, in Cabanatuan in the Philippines.

sentences: Bernardo was raised a member of Iglesia ni Cristo, but she is now practicing Evangelical Protestantism.
